name: Wrath
description:
Hands that shed innocent blood! There are n guilty people in a line, the i-th
of them holds a claw with length Li. The bell rings and every person kills
some of people in front of him. All people kill others at the same time.
Namely, the i-th person kills the j-th person if and only if j < i and j ≥ i -
Li. You are given lengths of the claws. You need to find the total number of
alive people after the bell rings. Input The first line contains one integer n
(1 ≤ n ≤ 10^6) — the number of guilty people. Second line contains n space-
separated integers L1, L2, ..., Ln (0 ≤ Li ≤ 10^9), where Li is the length of
the i-th person's claw. Output Print one integer — the total number of alive
people after the bell rings. Examples Input 4 0 1 0 10 Output 1 Input 2 0 0
Output 2 Input 10 1 1 3 0 0 0 2 1 0 3 Output 3 Note In first sample the last
person kills everyone in front of him.
